GTG, guys. Gotta fold in for the night.

::Perndabot::

Perndabot doesn't let any of the surprise betray his exression as 
Biomass reveals a restored chest plate. He narrows his eyes.

"Good. 'Cause I'm no loser." He doesn't bother to draw his missile 
launcher again. He'd crush this bot with his bare hands.





--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
> 
> * Biomass only laughs again after Perndabot does, wondering if this 
guy knew 
> what he was dealing with.
> But at the mention of the hole that WAS in his chest, Biomass 
throws his 
> cape back to reviel his chest-plate...completely unmarked and 
solid, the 
> only evidence of a wound being that of a scuff mark on his plating.*
> 
> " Niether am I, how ironic."
> 
> * Biomass doen't even look as new bots arrive, glaring at Perndabot 
as he 
> clenches his fists, hearing his knuckles pop.*
> 
> " No loser has beaten me yet, and today will not be the day one 
does."
> 
> 
> 
> 
>
